casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE. No. 606A05-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 15, 2016. Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Lane, Eric Glenn. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Nicholaos Vlahos, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of January 2016 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of January 2016."

Court reporter shall have up to and including the 19th day of February 2016 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel.
